title: EOSC Service Bundle
description: JSON Schema for an EOSC Service Bundle, derived from the example payload and Appendix B of the "Federating Capabilities for EOSC Service Catalogues" guide.

status.description: Must match a value from the Resource Status controlled vocabulary.

resourceOrganisationGroupID.description: Identifier of the organisation group that owns the service profile.

nodeId.description: Identifier of the node contributing the service.

Metadata.description: Metadata describing when and by whom the bundle was registered and updated.

registeredAt.description: Milliseconds since epoch when the resource was registered (string form).

modifiedAt.description: Milliseconds since epoch for the most recent update (string form).

LoggingInfo.description: Audit details for lifecycle events. Appendix B does not detail the fields, so the structure is left open.

semanticRelationship.description: Must match a value from the Semantic Relationship controlled vocabulary.

type.description: Must match a value from the Endpoint Type controlled vocabulary.

monitoringServiceType.description: Must match a value from the Monitoring Service Type controlled vocabulary.

serviceOfferFinalization.description: Must match a value from the Integration Status controlled vocabulary.

accountIntegration.description: Must match a value from the Integration Status controlled vocabulary.

aaiIntegration.description: Must match a value from the Integration Status controlled vocabulary.

omsIntegration.description: Must match a value from the Integration Status controlled vocabulary.

securityCompliance.description: Must match a value from the Integration Status controlled vocabulary.

wpfsIntegration.description: Must match a value from the Integration Status controlled vocabulary.

consentDataStorage.description: Consent to automatically store submitted information in the EOSC EU Node catalogue services.

consentResourceHubDisplay.description: Consent to display selected information in the EOSC Resource Hub after onboarding.

consentEndpointMonitoring.description: Consent to automatically monitor registered service endpoints for uptime.

consentSecurityContact.description: Consent for the security contact to be contacted by the EOSC Security Team in case of incidents.

category.description: Must match a value from the Category controlled vocabulary.

subcategory.description: Must match a value from the Subcategory controlled vocabulary.

scientificDomain.description: Must match a value from the Scientific Domain controlled vocabulary.

scientificSubdomain.description: Must match a value from the Scientific Subdomain controlled vocabulary.

Service.description: Detailed metadata describing the service offering.

id.description: Unique identifier for the service (auto-generated by EOSC systems).

abbreviation.description: Short abbreviation for the service name.

resourceOrganisation.description: Name of the organisation providing the service.

tagline.description: Short marketing tagline for the service.

logo.description: URL for the service logo image.

items.description: Must match a value from the Target User controlled vocabulary.
Must match a value from the Access Type controlled vocabulary.
Must match a value from the Access Mode controlled vocabulary.

horizontalService.description: Indicates whether the service is classified as horizontal.

items.description: Must match a value from the Service Category controlled vocabulary.
Must match a value from the Marketplace Location controlled vocabulary.
Must match a value from the Region controlled vocabulary.
Must match a value from the Language controlled vocabulary.
Must match a value from the Country controlled vocabulary.

trl.description: Must match a value from the Trl controlled vocabulary.

lifeCycleStatus.description: Must match a value from the Life Cycle Status controlled vocabulary.

lastUpdate.description: Timestamp of the most recent update (ISO 8601).

items.description: Must match a value from the Related Platform controlled vocabulary.
Must match a value from the Funding Body controlled vocabulary.
Must match a value from the Funding Program controlled vocabulary.

termsOfUse.description: URL of the service terms of use.

resourceLevel.description: URL describing the resource level details.

trainingInformation.description: URL for training material or information.

statusMonitoring.description: URL exposing service status or monitoring data.

maintenance.description: URL describing maintenance procedures or schedules.

orderType.description: Must match a value from the Order Type controlled vocabulary.

order.description: URL to initiate a service order (if applicable).
